text: un meṅ dubārā ḳhushī-o-shādmānī, dūlhe dulhan kī āwāz aur Rab ke ghar meṅ shukrguzārī kī qurbāniyāṅ pahuṅchāne wāloṅ ke gīt sunāī deṅge. Us waqt wuh gāeṅge, ‘Rabbul-afwāj kā shukr karo, kyoṅki Rab bhalā hai, aur us kī shafqat abadī hai.’ Kyoṅki maiṅ is mulk ko pahle kī tarah bahāl kar dūṅgā. Yih Rab kā farmān hai.
